docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., March 26 -- Women have been given political equality in most countries. But when it comes to government jobs, salaries and promotions, discrimination still is practiced.
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., March 26 -- Women have been given political equality in most countries. But when it comes to government jobs, salaries and promotions, discrimination still is practiced.

headline.main: MALE BIAS FOUND IN GOVERNMENTS; U.N. Surveys Say a Woman Is Handicapped in Winning High Civil Service Job

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: WOMEN, COMMISSION ON THE STATUS OF

byline.original: By KATHLEEN TELTSCHSpecial to The New York Times

docs.snippet: THE New York City Ballet will return to the City Center on Tuesday night to open its spring season of four weeks. One of the two new productions on its schedule will be on the opening night's bill.
docs.lead_paragraph: THE New York City Ballet will return to the City Center on Tuesday night to open its spring season of four weeks. One of the two new productions on its schedule will be on the opening night's bill.

headline.main: THE DANCE: OPENING; New York City Ballet In Spring Season

docs.snippet: COLUMBUS, Ga., March 27 (AP) -- Wiffi Smith made up 7 strokes, with a 4-under-par 68 today, to win the $8,000 Columbus women's open golf tournament by one shot. Her total for the four rounds was 298.
docs.lead_paragraph: COLUMBUS, Ga., March 27 (AP) -- Wiffi Smith made up 7 strokes, with a 4-under-par 68 today, to win the $8,000 Columbus women's open golf tournament by one shot. Her total for the four rounds was 298.

docs.snippet: Week Ended March 25, 1960 British pound sterling continued strong in the foreign exchange market during the past week. Canadian dollar showed a steady undertone on moderate dealings.
docs.lead_paragraph: Week Ended March 25, 1960 British pound sterling continued strong in the foreign exchange market during the past week. Canadian dollar showed a steady undertone on moderate dealings.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, March 29 -- One of the two American fliers forced down in Cuba last week has signed an affidavit that, according to reliable sources, states that the Cuban Government conspired in the illegal flight.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 29 -- One of the two American fliers forced down in Cuba last week has signed an affidavit that, according to reliable sources, states that the Cuban Government conspired in the illegal flight.
docs.abstract: State Dept confirms it has Shergales affidavit stating that he plotted with Dr Orta and other Castro aides to hire Rundquist and stage 'rescue' of Montesino group; failure linked to injury of Rundquist; US agencies continue probe; Swing rept on alleged role of Ek discussed

headline.main: 2 AMERICAN FLIERS LINKED TO CASTRO IN PLANE INCIDENT; U.S. Has Affidavit Signed by Co-Pilot on Illegal Flight -- Investigation Pushed

docs.snippet: Bobby Fischer, the United States chess champion, started with a victory yesterday in the Argentine Chess Federation tournament at Mar del Plata, according to a report received through South American news sources last night.
docs.lead_paragraph: Bobby Fischer, the United States chess champion, started with a victory yesterday in the Argentine Chess Federation tournament at Mar del Plata, according to a report received through South American news sources last night.

headline.main: FISCHER DEFEATS WEXLER IN CHESS; Forces Argentine Champion to Resign in 40 Moves at Mar Del Plata
